# Pull Request Review Instructions

Rules for new entries in each category table.

These types of promotions/discounts/deals will **NOT** be accepted. These rules are designed to maximize satisfaction for people who browse the deal list and use the deals to buy the listed products.

ðŸš« 100% OFF deals, "Free while in beta" deals
ðŸš« "Anti-sale"/"price increase soon" deals
ðŸš« Pre-order deals
ðŸš« Deals contain shortened links
ðŸš« Deals with links to other deals/bundles/listings
ðŸš« Deals that ask people to like/comment/subscribe/contact us/do something to get the discount code
ðŸš« Deals that are not specific for Black Friday.
ðŸš« Deals that are unclear whether it is a real deal or fake deal, for example, no indication on the product page to show specific Black Friday discount, timeline, specific discount amount/percentage, specific discount code, etc.

Other rules:
ðŸš« If you have more than 2 deals/courses/apps that are closely related to each other, please submit them as only 1 entry, not multiple ones (i.e., don't spam the links in all the categories).
ðŸš« Please don't create new categories by yourself, put your deal in the MISC section and we'll categorize them later
ðŸš« Please clean up your PR so that it only contains relevant diff (to add or update your discount). If the PR has too many unrelated diff it won't be merged.
